Package com.ap.kas.controllers

Class PasswordController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ap.kas.controllers.PasswordController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("change_password")
public class PasswordController
extends java.lang.Object
    The PasswordController class contains all methods needed to perform password-related CRUD operations on the database

      • createPasswordRequest

        @PostMapping("/request")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MessageResponse> createPasswordRequest​(@Valid @ModelAttribute
                                                                                      @Valid PasswordChangeRequestDto passwordChangeRequest)
        Sends a password change request to the given email
        Parameters:
        passwordChangeRequest - - Dto containing the name and email adress of the user requesting the password change
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity - Contains either a 200(OK) or a 400(BAD REQUEST)

      • changePassword

        @PutMapping("/change")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MessageResponse> changePassword​(@Valid @ModelAttribute
                                                                               @Valid PasswordChangeDto passwordChangeDto)
        Changes a users password
        Parameters:
        passwordChangeDto - - Contains the new password and the users token
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity - Contains either a 200(OK) OR a 400(BAD REQUEST) if the token is invalid
